song.title: Great I Am
song.lyrics:
[1] .D G A D I wanna to be close close to Your side . G A Bm/D So heaven is real and death is a lie || . G A D I wanna hear voices of angels above . G (A) Singing as one
[C] . Bm G Hallelujah Holy Holy . D A God almighty, the great I am || . Bm Who is worthy . G None beside Thee . D God Almighty . A The great I Am
---
[2] .D G A D I wanna be near near to Your heart . G A Bm/D Loving the world, hating the dark || . G A D I want to see dry bones living again . G (A) Singing as one
[B] .Bm The mountains shake before You, the demons run and flee .G At the mention of the name King of Majesty || .D There is no power in hell or any who can stand .A Before the power and the presence of || . Bm G The Great I am The Great I am . D A The Great I am The Great I am
